description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the elevation of privilege vulnerability in tencent rapidjson due to an integer overflow:

1. Download and install the latest updates provided in the KB articles from the Microsoft Update Catalog.
2. Ensure to update the systems to at least these build numbers:
   - Windows 11 Version 23H2: 10.0.22631.3880
   - Windows 10 Version 22H2: 10.0.19045.4651
3. Restart the system after the installation completes to apply changes.

**Details**:
- This update resolves the integer overflow vulnerability that could potentially allow attackers to escalate privileges when parsing JSON text.
- Reference the following KB articles for more detailed information: 
   - KB5040442: [Update Link](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040442)
   - KB5040431: [Update Link](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040431)
   - KB5040427: [Update Link](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040427)
   - KB5040448: [Update Link](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040448)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is one of the affected builds specified above.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
